desc: 매 턴 HP 회복&데미지를 입으면 확률로 HP 조금 회복

dictionary.lore:
"The Tale of the Soldier with Shining Wings on his Back"
The sacred fire bird, shining wings--symbols of immortality and proof of courage. Once it rescued a gentle soldier, and again healed a knight of love. When it flutters its burning wings, its wick of life bursts into flames. Concealing a just heart in its chest, it wields a sword that detests sin in order to protect the flame of life, no matter how small it may be. Regardless of how many times it is struck to the ground, it continues to stand up again and again.

name: 피닉스의 빛나는 날개
